Dialogue.Page: Oh yeah, Anon? They really don’t like the light, you know.
You have to walk up to them without any lights on, or else they will just keep kicking you out, like, again and again.
Once you done it the first time, it’s too late, my friend.
You might have to restart to be able to talk to them again. It can be a bit annoying, but that is how it is!
